articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Mayor Adams mulls zoning changes in bet on NYC casinos
articles.description: Mayor Eric Adams and the City Council are mulling changes to the zoning law to bet on proposed casinos in locations including Times Square, Hudson Yards, the Trump Golf Course at Ferry Point in The Bronx, Willets Point in Queens and Coney Island in Brooklyn, sources told The Post.
articles.content:
Mayor Eric Adams and the City Council are mulling changes to the zoning law to make opening as many as three casinos in New York City a sure bet, sources told The Post.
